item.title: Open Jam 2022 theme announcement
item.description: The theme for Open Jam 2022 is… LIGHT IN THE DARKNESS! Join the jam at Open Jam 2022!

item.title: Open Jam 2021 theme announcement
item.description: Open Jam 2021 has two themes you can pick from… Cats OR Dogs!!! Join the jam at Open Jam 2021!

item.title: Open Jam 2020 theme announcement
